Package doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers

Class DoaSpriteRenderer

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.scene.DoaComponent
doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers.DoaRenderer
doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers.DoaSpriteRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
A
public class DoaSpriteRenderer
extends DoaRenderer
Sprite renderer. Renders sprites created by DoaSprites.createSprite(String, String) of DoaSprites.createSpriteFromSpriteSheet(String, String, java.awt.Rectangle).
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected DoaVector dimensions
    Dimensions of the rendered sprite, in pixels.
    protected DoaVector offset
    Offset of the rendered sprite.
    protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage sprite
    The sprite this renderer will render.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DoaVector getDimensions()  
    DoaVector getOffset()  
    java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite()  
    void render()
    Do not call this method. This method is called by DoaEngine when: This renderer is added to a DoaObject, The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene, The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded. Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.

  • Field Details

    • sprite

      protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage sprite
      The sprite this renderer will render.

    • offset

      protected DoaVector offset
      Offset of the rendered sprite. Offset is calculated from top left of the transform's position.

    • dimensions

      protected DoaVector dimensions
      Dimensions of the rendered sprite, in pixels.

  • Method Details

    • setSprite

      public void setSprite​(@NotNull @NotNull java.awt.image.BufferedImage sprite)
      Sets the sprite to render. Will update the dimensions to the dimensions of the passed sprite.
      Parameters:
      sprite - new sprite to render

    • setSprite

      public void setSprite​(@NotNull @NotNull java.awt.image.BufferedImage sprite, boolean useDimensions)
      Sets the sprite to render.
      Parameters:
      sprite - new sprite to render
      useDimensions - if true, dimensions are updated to the dimensions of the passed sprite

    • setOffset

      public void setOffset​(@NotNull @NotNull DoaVector offset)

    • getOffset

      public DoaVector getOffset()

    • getDimensions

      public DoaVector getDimensions()

    • render

      public void render()
      Do not call this method. This method is called by DoaEngine when:
      1. This renderer is added to a DoaObject,
      2. The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene,
      3. The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded.
      Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.
      Specified by:
      render in class DoaRenderer
